scripts.publish:patch: yarn run build && npm version patch && git commit -am 'publish' && git push origin master && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:minor: yarn run build && npm version minor && git commit -am 'publish' && git push origin master && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:major: yarn run build && npm version major && git commit -am 'publish' && git push origin master && npm publish --access=public
